channel.title: DVD Burning?
channel.description: Alright I have a 150 minute dvd and a 157 minute movie. I want to burn 2 dvd's with the one movie on it. How can i do this? what program should i use.

item.title: DVD Burning?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

I would use alchol 120%
that program allows you to like make a window with all the things you want to burn onto a cd (like if you were to put many songs on) and then click “burn the selected item(s)” and it will burn it into your cd. Now i would recommend going to Tricks, tutorials or tweaks and go to the sticky about all the threads, and in which category. Then find the one for free software and find alcohol 120%

Read full topic

item.title: DVD Burning?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:8, topic:191759”]Just a tip, incase you some how hadn’t thought of it.
Find a program which decreases the quality, that way it wont take up as much room on a disk.[/quote]

I dont want to though and i thought about it.

Read full topic

item.title: DVD Burning?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Just a tip, incase you some how hadn’t thought of it.

item.title: DVD Burning?
item.dc:creator: @Larzon Larzon
item.description:
@Larzon wrote:

I would suggest Clone CD
thay can keep the buffer up
and you can select some things you want on your disk
like ad’s for other movies

langues can be deleted

item.title: DVD Burning?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:4, topic:191759”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=255423.msg2133402#msg2133402 date=1206411165]

Check the disk-space your movie use and the DVD have space to, NOT the minutes.

umm it wont let me burn it anyways…
[/quote]
Remove junk on the DVD you don’t need, like soundtrack and subtiles that are useless.[/quote]

there is nothing on the dvd… the movie is bigger then the dvd -.-

Read full topic
